-Kk1Xr2syRJ0V7NDKjSK.description: Tinyhouse university is a Berlin-based NGO founded by Van Bo Le-Mentzel, designers, education activists and refugees. Our goal is to create new models of social neighborhoods. Our tools are architecture and the beliefs that make diversity a village stronger than common sense.

-Kk1Xr2x-iftLqPsxscG.description: Berlin Basic Income is a local group that explores strategies to implement a universal basic income (UBI), including unconventional methods that may start outside of the usual political process (e.g. the basic income cryptocurrency Circles).

-Kk1Xr2ytzY1xPWUVXWP.description: Kreuzberg Music co-op is a group dedicated to sharing the means of music production. If you are a musician or a music lover this is the place for you.

-Kk1Xr2ytzY1xPWUVXWQ.description: Radwerk is a collective of Berlin bike shops. We share resources, time and knowledge :)
